responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I am fine, thanks for asking!

patterns: What can I do for better sleep?
responses: How about trying a regular sleep and wake-up schedule? It can really help!
Maybe skip the late coffee and keep your phone away before bed—it makes a difference!
Relaxing stuff like deep breaths or meditation might work wonders for you
Your room could be a sleep haven—make it comfy and peaceful
Light meals in the evening are your friend; save the heavy stuff for earlier
Daytime exercise’s great but keep it earlier in the day
And if it’s still tricky, a friendly chat with a doctor might help!
